root.name: Hakuoki: Stories of the Shinsengumi
root.description: OverviewHakuoki Junsouroku is an otome game developed by Design Factory for the PlayStation 3. It combines the contents of the original Hakuoki game with the Hakuoki Zuisouroku side story, as well as adding animation effects (mouth movements, etc.) to the illustrations and access to downloadable bonus content.It has been licensed for North American release by Aksys Games.
